content: a colorful mix of oak birch and maple leaves for your fall or holiday décor use as garland coasters or just sprinkle around the room for that fall pop of color pattern uses one fall festival bundle experience level * intermediate materials * woolstok worsted bundle 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds each 1 bundle fall festival * size 6 4mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge * size 6 4mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge * tapestry needle finished measurements * birch 4¼ height by 3 width * maple 3½ height by 4½ width * oak 4¾ height by 3½ width height does not include stem colors shown * fall festival bundle
